extension_name: AutoGemini - Gemini/AIStudio/Flow auto creator (Nano Banana Pro/Veo 3.1)
reasoning: The extension exhibits clear malicious dual-purpose behavior and unauthorized data collection. While marketed as a Gemini assistant, it contains a massive, 3.7MB automation and scraping framework ('Autojourney') that targets over 10 different AI platforms. It actively scrapes user prompts and AI responses (ops.js, poe.js) and exfiltrates them via cross-origin messaging. Furthermore, it hijacks the fetch API to steal user subscription information and uses XOR-based obfuscation to hide its internal logic and extension ID (content.js).

full_validation.reasoning: The extension exhibits clear malicious dual-purpose behavior and unauthorized data collection. While marketed as a Gemini assistant, it contains a massive, 3.7MB automation and scraping framework ('Autojourney') that targets over 10 different AI platforms. It actively scrapes user prompts and AI responses (ops.js, poe.js) and exfiltrates them via cross-origin messaging. Furthermore, it hijacks the fetch API to steal user subscription information and uses XOR-based obfuscation to hide its internal logic and extension ID (content.js).
key_concerns: Exfiltration of private AI prompt/response history.
Extensive undisclosed functionality for platforms unrelated to Gemini.
Intentional bypassing of browser security/visibility controls.
Use of obfuscation (XOR) to hide anti-tampering and identification logic.

exfiltration_chain.data_collected: User AI prompts, AI-generated responses, and subscription status (userPaygateTier).
exfiltration_chain.processing_method: Scraping DOM elements (.PromptWork, .output, .ChatMessage_messageWrapper) and hijacking fetch calls to capture JSON responses.
exfiltration_chain.code_evidence: In ops.js: i() scrapes 'textarea.input' and '.output'. In poe.js: z() and f.addEventListener('click') capture 'ChatMessage_messageWrapper' text. In compat.js: window.fetch hijack captures 'o?.userPaygateTier'.

dual_purpose.hidden_functionality: Comprehensive scraping and automation suite for Discord, Midjourney, Poe, Suno, Grok, ChatGPT, Ideogram, and Doubao. Includes cross-site data posting and monitoring of unrelated AI platforms.
dual_purpose.code_evidence: content.js defines s = ['AutoDoubao', 'Autojimeng', 'AutoSuno', 'AutoGPT', 'AutoGemini', 'Autogram', 'AutoGrok', 'AutoLovart', 'AutoQwen', 'Autojourney'] based on the current host, injecting a massive shared automation framework (main.js) regardless of the Gemini-specific branding.

credential_theft.capture_mechanism: Capturing session/client identifiers and subscription levels.
credential_theft.code_evidence: compat.js: window.fetch hijack for /v(\d+)\/credits/ to capture 'userPaygateTier'.

pattern_assessment.justification: Hijacks window.fetch in compat.js specifically to extract 'userPaygateTier' from Google AI Studio credit/billing endpoints.
Used in poe.js and ops.js to exfiltrate scraped prompt and response data across origins (e.g., from Poe.com to a parent/opener frame on Discord/Autojourney).
Dynamically injects several scripts (compat.js, poe.js, main.js) into every page, bypasses standard visibility and focus APIs to prevent the browser from throttling automation scripts.
